ssot__ProductOrderEngagement__dlm.name: Product Order Engagement
ssot__ProductOrderEngagement__dlm.description: The Product Order Engagement DMO represents a user's online shopping order data.

ssot__AccountContactId__c.description: A reference ID to account contact.

ssot__ActionCadenceStepId__c.description: A reference ID to action cadence step.

ssot__AdjustedTotalProductAmount__c.description: The total amount of a product after adjustments.

ssot__CaseId__c.description: A reference ID to a recorded issue, for example laptop connectivity.

ssot__ContactPointId__c.description: A reference ID to accounts’ contact point, for example physical address, email address, or phone number.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__CurrencyId__c.description: A reference ID to the currency of an order.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__DeviceCountryId__c.description: A reference ID to country where device is located.

ssot__DeviceIPAddress__c.description: The IP address of a device.

ssot__DeviceLatitude__c.description: The geo latitude of the device when the engagement was recorded.

ssot__DeviceLocaleId__c.description: A reference ID to user locale configured on device.

ssot__DeviceLongitude__c.description: The geo longitude of the device when the engagement was recorded.

ssot__DevicePostalCode__c.description: The postal code associated with device.

ssot__EngagementAssetId__c.description: A reference ID for the type of engagement asset.

ssot__EngagementChannelId__c.description: A reference ID for the engagement channel.

ssot__EngagementChannelActionId__c.description: A reference ID for the engagement action.

ssot__EngagementChannelTypeId__c.description: A reference ID for the engagement channel type.

ssot__EngagementDateTm__c.description: The date and time of the engagement.

ssot__EngagementEventDirectionId__c.description: The engagement event direction where values are inbound or outbound.

ssot__EngagementNotesTxt__c.description: The details about what transpired during engagement.

ssot__EngagementNbr__c.description: A user-facing ID that isn’t automatically set using auto-number.

ssot__EngagementPublicationId__c.description: A reference ID for a background process that generates volumes of emails, SMS, or other engagement types.

ssot__EngagementTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to type of engagement, for example email or phone.

ssot__EngagementVehicleId__c.description: A reference ID for the vehicle through which the engagement was recorded.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__IndividualId__c.description: A reference ID to contact for account.

ssot__InternalEngagementActorId__c.description: A reference ID for an internal engagement actor that groups the different types of individuals who are targets of marketing engagements.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__IsGiftOrder__c.description: An indicator if the order is a gift.

ssot__IsTestSend__c.description: An indicator if the engagement record was generated as part of testing.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__LeadlId__c.description: A reference ID to person or company that showed interest in products.

ssot__LinkURL__c.description: The URL that was used to access a software application or web page.

ssot__MarketAudienceId__c.description: A reference ID to intended audience that engagement was designed to reach.

ssot__MarketJourneyActivityId__c.description: A reference ID to step or activity that customer configures in Salesforce Journey Builder tool for marketing associated with engagement.

ssot__MarketSegmentId__c.description: A reference ID to group of people who share one or more common characteristics, and are grouped for marketing associated with engagement.

ssot__MarketingEmailListId__c.description: A reference ID for a set of email addresses that is used for marketing communications.

ssot__Id__c.description: A reference ID for the Product Order Engagement DMO.

ssot__ProductOrderEventTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the product order event type.

ssot__Referrer__c.description: A container that stores contextual data about the user's usage of the site or the application that referred them to the software application that generated the engagement. For example, a campaign or search advertisement.

ssot__ReferrerURL__c.description: The URL of application that directed user to software application that generated engagement.

ssot__SalesOrderId__c.description: An internal document generated by seller indicating that customer is ready to purchase products and services.

ssot__SentDateTm__c.description: The date and time when the publication or communication was sent.

ssot__SessionId__c.description: A reference ID for the session used to group related events together.

ssot__ShoppingCartId__c.description: A reference ID to shopping cart for data captured from user actions, for example adding or removing items from shopping cart.

ssot__TargetEngagementActorId__c.description: A reference ID to engagement actor that groups different types of individuals targeted for marketing associated with engagement, for example leads and account contacts.

ssot__TaskId__c.description: A reference ID to business activity, for example making a phone call.

ssot__TotalAdjustmentAmount__c.description: The total amount of an order after adjustments.

ssot__TotalDeliveryAmount__c.description: The total amount of delivery for an order.

ssot__TotalProductTaxAmount__c.description: The total amount of tax on a product.

ssot__TotalTaxAmount__c.description: The total amount of tax on an order.

ssot__WebCookieId__c.description: A reference ID to small piece of data sent from website and stored on user's computer by user's web browser while user is browsing.

ssot__WorkflowId__c.description: A reference ID to the sequence of steps or processes in software application.
